price: 85.Tokkel Yalli tamah iyyeenimih Sabbatah weeqaytitte guba kak gexxa Jannootal ken gälte usun teetil waarak, woh taamaa kee maxco kak temqe marih galtó kinni.
arabic: فَأَثَٰبَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا قَالُواْ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-athābahumu al-lahu bimā qālū jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā wadhālika jazāu al-muḥ'sinīna
